# Etherealness (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[9th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 9]], [[9th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 9]], [[9th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 9]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 18th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 18]], [[BoXM 18th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 18]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch; see text

**Targets:** You and one other touched creature per three levels

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 279

This spell functions like *[[Ethereal Jaunt (Spell)|ethereal jaunt]]**,* except that you and other willing creatures joined by linked hands (along with their equipment) become ethereal. Besides yourself, you can bring one creature per three caster levels to the [[Ethereal Plane]]. Once ethereal, the subjects need not stay together.

When the spell expires, all affected creatures on the [[Ethereal Plane]] return to material existence.
